sentences.sContent: Players often play this trill as a mordent and in most cases even this is not done properly.
sentences.sContent_eng: Players often play this trill as a mordent and in most cases even this is not done properly.
sentences.sCn: 演奏者们常常把颤音演奏成波音，在绝大多数情况下波音也不能完整的演奏好。

trans.tranOther: a melodic ornament consisting of the rapid alternation of a note with a note one degree lower than it
